purpleculture_pinyin:
xún
to ask about; to inquire about
спросить; узнать о

询询		enquire into, ask about, consult
  • enquiry lasting ten days 旬 of spoken 言 questions
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 询)
Pictophonetic: 旬 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 詢問 [ xún wèn ]: to inquire
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 旬 [ xún ] ten-day period; period of time
heisig_chinese_memo: In order to provide superior counsel, I spoke to him for ten days to inquire about everything.
Ru_Words:
諮詢しじゅん
  • кн. запрос, консультация с кем-л., наведение справок
    • warodai
    交詢こうじゅん
  • кн. развитие (расширение, укрепление) дружественных связей
    • warodai
    諮詢しじゅん
  • запрос, консультация
    • 詢るはかる — чаще 諮るはかる
  • консультироваться, совещаться, согласовывать что-л. с кем-л.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: No matter which time of the month (decameron) I need to inquire with words about the date because I can never remember it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " Xun " sound. " Inquiry " means soliciting opinions and asking for advice. "Jade articles. Yanbu: "Inquiry, consult." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Board": "The ancestors had a word, inquire about me." It means to ask someone who mows grass and collects salaries. "Zuo Zhuan. "Thirteenth Year of Cheng Gong": "Doctor Qin does not inquire about my widow, but is good at Zheng Meng."

" Inquiry " can mean investigation and inquiry. "Shu Wen Xin Fu": "Inquiry, seek also. Cong Yan, Xun Sheng." Such as "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "A person is killed by thunder. Ask his body if he feels burnt." "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Yang Giving Shi Lei": "The last minister Menggu, he heard from the side, and dared to consult the former scriptures, and slander."

" Inquiry " can be connected to " equal ", which means coordination. "Shang Shu Da Biography. "Yu Xia Chuan": "Therefore, we change the chopsticks at four o'clock, push the six rules and six lv, inquire ten has two changes, and the Tao is magnificent." Zheng Xuan's note: "Inquiry, all."
humanum_short_description_en: From " yan " to " Xun " sound. " Inquiry " means soliciting opinions and asking for advice.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「旬」聲。「詢」表示徵求意見、請教。《玉篇．言部》：「詢，咨也。」如《詩．大雅．板》：「先民有言，詢于芻蕘。」意謂請教割草采薪之人。《左傳．成公十三年》：「秦大夫不詢于我寡君，擅及鄭盟。」

　　「詢」可表示查考、查問。《說文新附》：「詢，謀也。从言，旬聲。」如《論衡．雷虛》：「人為雷所殺，詢其身體，若燔灼之狀也。」《文選．顏延年〈陽給事誄〉》：「末臣蒙固，側聞至訓，敢詢諸前典，而為之誄。」

　　「詢」可通「均」，表示協調。《尚書大傳．虞夏傳》：「故更箸四時，推六律六呂，詢十有二變，而道宏廣。」鄭玄注：「詢，均也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「旬」聲。「詢」表示徵求意見、請教。

(Simplified: 询)

Chinese: In order to provide superior counsel, I spoke to him for ten days to inquire about everything.
Meaning: inquire

Story: No matter which time of the month (decameron) I need to inquire with words about the date because I can never remember it.
Kind: traditional

從「 言 」，「 旬 」聲。「 詢 」表示徵求意見、請教。《玉篇．言部》：「詢，咨也。」如《詩．大雅．板》：「先民有言，詢于芻蕘。」意謂請教割草采薪之人。《左傳．成公十三年》：「秦大夫不詢于我寡君，擅及鄭盟。」 「 詢 」可表示查考、查問。《說文新附》：「詢，謀也。从言，旬聲。」如《論衡．雷虛》：「人為雷所殺，詢其身體，若燔灼之狀也。」《文選．顏延年〈陽給事誄〉》：「末臣蒙固，側聞至訓，敢詢諸前典，而為之誄。」 「 詢 」可通「 均 」，表示協調。《尚書大傳．虞夏傳》：「故更箸四時，推六律六呂，詢十有二變，而道宏廣。」鄭玄注：「詢，均也。」
From " speak" to " Xun" sound. " Inquiry" means soliciting opinions and asking for advice. "Jade articles. Yanbu: "Inquiry, consult." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Board": "The ancestors had a word, inquire about me." It means to ask someone who mows grass and collects salaries. "Zuo Zhuan. "Thirteenth Year of Cheng Gong": "Doctor Qin does not inquire about my widow, but is good at Zheng Meng." " Inquiry" can mean investigation and inquiry. "Shu Wen Xin Fu": "Inquiry, seek also. Cong Yan, Xun Sheng." Such as "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "A person is killed by thunder. Ask his body if he feels burnt." "Selected Works. Yan Yannian "Yang Giving Shi Lei": "The last minister Menggu, he heard from the side, and dared to consult the former scriptures, and slander." " Inquiry" can be connected to " equal", which means coordination. "Shang Shu Da Biography. "Yu Xia Chuan": "Therefore, we change the chopsticks at four o'clock, push the six rules and six lv, inquire ten has two changes, and the Tao is magnificent." Zheng Xuan's note: "Inquiry, all."

詢字的基本解释

詢
xún
见“询”。

詢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xún］
［《廣韻》相倫切，平諄，心。］
亦作“咰1”。“询1”的繁体字。
(1)询问；问。
(2)指访问。
(3)谋，谋划。
(4)查考。
(5)侦察，查探。
(6)均；调协。
(7)副词。犹确实。
(8)用同“訊”。参见“詢聞”。

詢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1156第20
【唐韻】相倫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】須倫切，?音荀。【說文】謀也。【玉篇】咨也。【書·舜典】詢事考言。【詩·小雅】周爰咨詢。【傳】親戚之謀爲詢。【左傳·襄四年】諮親爲詢。　又【爾雅·釋詁】信也。【註】宋衞曰詢。【疏】按方言：宋衞汝潁之閒曰洵。鄭風溱洧：洵訏且樂。詢、洵音義同。　【玉篇】或作?。【集韻】或作?、咰。【字彙補】譌作?。

Basic explanation of words
Inquire
xún
See "Inquiry".
Inquire
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xún］
["Guangyun" is coherent, smooth, heart-shaped. ]
Also known as "咰1". Traditional Chinese characters for "Inquiry 1".
(1) Ask; ask.
(2) Refers to visits.
(3) Plan, plan.
(4) Check.
(5) Reconnaissance, investigation.
(6) Both; tuning and coordination.
(7) Adverbs. It's true.
(8) Use the same "xun". See "Inquiry".
Inquire
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　 Inquiry; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1156 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Xiang Lun Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Xu Lun Qi,? Yin Xun. 【Said Wen】Mou Ye. [Jade articles] Consultation also. 【Book·Shun Code】Inquiry and textual research. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Zhou Yan consulted. [Biography] Inquiries made by relatives. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Four Years] Consultation is an inquiry.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Xin Ye. [Note] Song Weiyue asked. 【Shu】According to the dialect: Song Wei and Ruying said Xun at leisure. Zheng Fengqin: Xunxun and happy. Inquiry and Xun have the same sound and meaning.　【Jade articles】Or make?. [Ji Yun] Or make?, eh. 【Word Supplement】Zhao Zuo?.
